00001 package prog.assignment.gol.board;
00002 
00003 import java.util.ArrayList;
00004 import java.util.List;
00005 
00006 import prog.assignment.gol.IConstants;
00007 import prog.assignment.gol.Logger;
00008 
00017 public class ListOfList {
00018 
00019         private List<ArrayList<Cell>> list;
00020         private int xSize, ySize;
00021         
00022         public int getXSize() {
00023                 return xSize;
00024         }
00025 
00026         public int getYSize() {
00027                 return ySize;
00028         }
00029 
00030         public ListOfList(int xSize, int ySize){
00031                 this.xSize = xSize;
00032                 this.ySize = ySize;
00033                 list  = new ArrayList<ArrayList<Cell>>();
00034                 
00035                 for (int y=0; y<ySize; y++){
00036                         ArrayList<Cell> row = new ArrayList<Cell>();
00037                         for (int x=0; x<xSize; x++){
00038                                 Cell cell = new Cell(x, y);
00039                                 row.add(cell);
00040                         }
00041                         list.add(row);
00042                 }
00043         }
00044         
00048         public Cell getCell(int x, int y){
00049                 if(x<0 || y<0|| x >= xSize || y >= ySize) return null;
00050                 return list.get(y).get(x);
00051         }
00052 
00056         public void prune(){
00057                 boolean pruneFirstRow = true;
00058                 boolean pruneLastRow = true;
00059                 boolean pruneFirstColumn = true;
00060                 boolean pruneLastColumn = true;
00061                 
00062                 //process fist row
00063                 for(Cell cell: list.get(0)){
00064                         if(cell.isAlive()){
00065                                 pruneFirstRow = false;
00066                                 break;
00067                         }
00068                 }
00069                 
00070                 //process last row
00071                 for(Cell cell: list.get(ySize-1)){
00072                         if(cell.isAlive()){
00073                                 pruneLastRow = false;
00074                                 break;
00075                         }
00076                 }
00077                 
00078                 //process first & last columns
00079                 for(List<Cell> row: list){
00080                         if(row.get(0).isAlive())pruneFirstColumn = false;
00081                         if(row.get(xSize-1).isAlive()) pruneLastColumn = false;
00082                 }
00083                 
00084                 if(pruneLastRow) list.remove(ySize-1);
00085                 if(pruneLastColumn) {
00086                         for(List<Cell> row: list) row.remove(xSize-1);
00087                 }
00088                 if(pruneFirstRow) list.remove(0);
00089                 if(pruneFirstColumn){
00090                         for(List<Cell> row: list) row.remove(0);
00091                 }
00092                 
00093                 ySize = list.size();
00094                 xSize = list.get(0).size();
00095         }
00096         
00097         public String toString(){
00098                 StringBuffer result = new StringBuffer();
00099                 
00100                 for(int y = 0; y < getYSize(); y++){
00101                         StringBuffer line = new StringBuffer();
00102                         for(int x = 0; x < getXSize(); x++){
00103                                 if(getCell(x,y).isAlive()){
00104                                         line.append(IConstants.ALIVE_CHAR).append(' ');
00105                                 } else {
00106                                         line.append(IConstants.DEAD_CHAR).append(' ');
00107                                 }
00108                         }
00109                         result.append(line.toString()).append("\n");
00110                 }
00111                 
00112                 return result.toString();               
00113         }
00114         
00115 }
